alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 13 at 5:54PM CDT until April 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL RANKIN AND EAST CENTRAL HINDS COUNTIES... At 554 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Byram, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Jackson around 600 PM CDT. Richland around 610 PM CDT. Pearl and Flowood around 620 PM CDT. Brandon around 630 PM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
